description.ko: 우주의 고요한 장엄함으로의 여정으로, 거대한 우주 구조물의 규모가 공포스러운 아름다움을 불러일으킵니다.
description.en: A journey into the silent majesty of the universe, where the scale of cosmic structures evokes a sense of terrifying beauty.

prompt: An impossible celestial gate at the edge of a #0D0221 supermassive black hole, with pillars made of #3D1A78 compressed starlight and swirling dark matter filaments. Surrounded by gas clouds of #7B68EE and #E6E6FA. Cosmic horror majesty on an infinite scale. 8k, hyper-realistic, volumetric gas simulations. Detailed textures of stardust and the silent majesty of the abyss, featuring global illumination from a distant pulsar and raytraced light scattering through the nebula.
